title: Hopes Dim For Turkish Miners, But Rescuers Carry On
teaser: Hope is fading that any more mine workers will be rescued from a mine in western Turkey, where over 280 miners died after an explosion. NPR's Leila Fadel has been at the mine and offers more details.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
